commits.name: Commit-0
commits.content:
# config/default_config.yaml
model:
  d_model: 512
  n_heads: 8
  n_encoder_layers: 6
  n_decoder_layers: 6
  d_ff: 2048
  dropout: 0.1
  kernel_size: 3
  max_seq_length: 1000

training:
  batch_size: 32
  learning_rate: 0.0001
  max_epochs: 100
  early_stopping_patience: 5
  weight_decay: 0.01
  warmup_steps: 1000
  gradient_clip_val: 1.0

data:
  data_path: "data/time_series_data.csv"
  target_column: "target"
  timestamp_column: "timestamp"
  feature_columns: ["feature1", "feature2"]
  window_size: 168
  prediction_horizon: 24
  train_ratio: 0.7
  val_ratio: 0.15
  batch_size: 32
  stride: 1
  scaling_method: "standard"
